sentences.sContent: The bladder, as we have found out, is another.
sentences.sContent_eng: The bladder, as we have found out, is another.
sentences.sCn: 我们还发现膀胱是另一组成部分。

sentences.sContent: This might irritate your bladder and aggravate your condition.
sentences.sContent_eng: This might irritate your bladder and aggravate your condition.
sentences.sCn: 这可能会刺激您的膀胱，并加剧您的病情。

sentences.sContent: So the ejaculation of semen goes backwards, up the penis and into the bladder.
sentences.sContent_eng: So the ejaculation of semen goes backwards, up the penis and into the bladder.
sentences.sCn: 所以射精时精液是逆向的，顺着阴茎向上到了膀胱里。

synos.tran: [解剖]膀胱；囊状物，可充气的囊袋

trans.tranOther: the organ in your body that holds  urine (=  waste liquid  )  until it is passed out of your body
